body_html:
By the way, I ask another related question.
When I use API train_and_evaluate , TenorFlow make a single node (not part of training cluster) that named Evaluator, it monitor the checkpoint directory and evaluate.
For large model, parameters' size cannot load by single node, Is there any suggestion about distributed evaluate in TensorFlow? Can evaluator reuse training cluster?
body_text:
By the way, I ask another related question.
When I use API train_and_evaluate , TenorFlow make a single node (not part of training cluster) that named Evaluator, it monitor the checkpoint directory and evaluate.
For large model, parameters' size cannot load by single node, Is there any suggestion about distributed evaluate in TensorFlow? Can evaluator reuse training cluster?
body:
By the way, I ask another related question.
When I use API `train_and_evaluate `, TenorFlow make a single node (not part of training cluster) that named `Evaluator`, it monitor the checkpoint directory and evaluate.
For large model, parameters' size cannot load by single node, Is there any suggestion about distributed evaluate in TensorFlow? Can evaluator reuse training cluster?
